_comments.name: REQUIRED: Display name shown in the UI when selecting this workflow
_comments.description: REQUIRED: Brief description of what this workflow does and when to use it
_comments.systemPrompt: REQUIRED: Instructions that set Claude's context when this workflow is activated. Explains methodology, lists available commands, sets behavior expectations
_comments.startupPrompt: REQUIRED: What Claude should do/say when first starting the workflow session. Typically includes greeting, introduction, and next steps
_comments.results: REQUIRED: Map of output artifact names (display names) to file path patterns. Supports glob patterns like ** for recursive matching. These paths are relative to the artifacts/ directory
